body.p:
Newport Ky Feby 27th 1864.
His Excellency
Thos E. Bramlette
Governor of Ky.
Dear Sir

I have the honor to request of you the favor of calling Genl Crittendens attention to my letter of the 26th in which in accordance with the rules regulating such matters, I have requested his letter in behalf of my application for a Lt Colonelcy in the Invalid Corps.
It is important I should have at least a kind word from my Corps Commander, and consequently have taken this method of obtaining same

Hoping to hear of your favorable action in the matter I am
Very Sincerly Your Obt Svt
Jno W. Jordan
formerly Major Inf Vol
